Pre-Game Insights: The USA earned a ticket to the knockout stages after finishing in Group A’s second spot, with five points, two behind leaders India.South Africa won all their matches to top Group C with eight points, two more than the second-placed Bangladesh.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is the first time the USA makes it to the event’s quarterfinals.Due to their achievement of progressing to the Super Eight, they will be able to feature in the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup in 2026.
Others: The game will be played on Wednesday, 19 June 2024, at Sir Vivian Richards Stadium, North Sound, Antigua.In the Super Eight, the best eight teams are split into two pools of four and will battle in a round-robin format, where the American side will try to take one of the first two spots to advance to the semifinals.You can watch a live stream of the game on fuboTV (free trial available).If you are in the US, you can watch the game on Sling, and Willow TV.We’ve assessed both teams’ recent form, injuries, suspensions, and general confidence levels, and we believe that the result will be: South Africa to win.
